page.title: 11WINGATE OPEN AIR MARKET
page.content: Wingate market is an open air market held weekly (Thursday) on a piece of waste land behind Front Street, Wingate.It is a "new" market because it has only been operating for 15 months.The most popular stalls are clothes stalls.One lady interviewed said that clothes stalls were popular because of the reasonably priced clothes. A 'cleaning' stall also had many customers and also a shoe stall which had a good selection of cheap shoes for both young and old. The people who go to this market are quite old and rarely shop out of Station Town or Wingate.The reason they shop at the market is because of the variety of stalls, and also it is within walking distance of their homes as many of them do not have cars and rely on public transport.
